entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to snow in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
